2015.context: GitLab Inc. is a DevSecOps platform company focused on source code management, CI/CD, and security in single platform. Open source Git platform. Self-hosted alternative to GitHub.

competitors.name: GitHub
competitors.notes: Dominant code hosting platform, particularly for open source

competitors.name: Bitbucket
competitors.notes: Atlassian's Git repository service

competitors.name: Jenkins
competitors.notes: Open-source CI/CD automation server

competitors.name: Travis CI
competitors.notes: Hosted CI service popular with open source projects

competitors.name: CircleCI
competitors.notes: Cloud-based continuous integration platform

2020.context: GitLab Inc. is a DevSecOps platform company focused on source code management, CI/CD, and security in single platform. Complete DevOps platform. Remote-first company IPO.

competitors.name: GitHub
competitors.notes: Primary competitor, owned by Microsoft since 2018, dominant in open source

competitors.name: Atlassian Bitbucket
competitors.notes: Git repository integrated with Jira and Confluence

competitors.name: Azure DevOps
competitors.notes: Microsoft's DevOps platform with Azure integration

competitors.name: CircleCI
competitors.notes: Popular CI/CD platform

competitors.name: Jenkins
competitors.notes: Open-source automation server for CI/CD

2024.context: GitLab Inc. is a DevSecOps platform company focused on source code management, CI/CD, and security in single platform. AI-powered DevSecOps with Duo. Security integration.

competitors.name: GitHub
competitors.notes: Focuses on collaboration and community with vast Marketplace of third-party integrations, GitHub Actions for automation, complete cloud-hosted developer platform

competitors.name: Azure DevOps
competitors.notes: Microsoft's collaborative development tool with comprehensive features, core strength in Azure integration, pricing starts at $6/user/month

competitors.name: Bitbucket
competitors.notes: Atlassian product specialized for teams using Jira, repository, security, version control, integrates with Jira and Confluence, starts at $3/user/month

competitors.name: CircleCI
competitors.notes: Popular CI/CD platform and top GitLab competitor

competitors.name: Gitea
competitors.notes: Best self-hosted alternative, free and open source

competitors.name: Gogs
competitors.notes: Self-hosted open-source alternative

competitors.name: Forgejo
competitors.notes: Self-hosted open-source Git hosting alternative

competitors.name: GitBucket
competitors.notes: Self-hosted Git platform alternative

2025.context: GitLab Inc. is a DevSecOps platform company focused on source code management, CI/CD, and security in single platform. Single DevSecOps platform. Competing with GitHub, Atlassian.

competitors.name: GitHub
competitors.notes: Primary competitor owned by Microsoft, leading code hosting and collaboration platform

competitors.name: Azure DevOps

competitors.name: JFrog

competitors.name: Jenkins

competitors.name: Harness

competitors.name: Snyk

mentionedBy.name: Atlassian Corporation

mentionedBy.name: Atlassian Corporation

mentionedBy.name: Atlassian Corporation
mentionedBy.notes: First alternative for end-to-end DevOps management. Delivers everything from version control to CI/CD on single platform. Brings all DevOps lifecycle stages into one uniform, user-friendly interface, minimizing friction between developer and operation teams

mentionedBy.name: JFrog Ltd.
mentionedBy.notes: All-in-one DevSecOps platform with integrated multi-format package registry, source code, CI/CD, and issues

mentionedBy.name: JFrog Ltd.
